footer.aboutText: We are a full-service digital agency, specialized in transforming ideas into results through innovative digital solutions.
footer.address: R. Empresário Lourival Lopes Filho, 105, Jardim Oceania, João Pessoa - PB

language.changedTo: The language has been changed to {{language}}

2018.title: The beginning of the journey
2018.description: Company foundation with a focus on web development and custom digital solutions.

2019.title: Service expansion
2019.description: We expanded our portfolio to include professional graphic design and digital marketing strategies.

2020.title: Adaptation and innovation
2020.description: During the pandemic, we developed digital solutions that helped businesses stay active and connected with their customers.

2022.title: Technological diversification
2022.description: We expanded to mobile app development and Virtual Learning Environments (VLEs).

2023.title: Digital political strategy
2023.description: We launched our specialized division in digital political marketing, offering complete solutions for campaigns.

2024.title: Sustainable growth
2024.description: We expanded our team and infrastructure to meet the growing demand for our integrated digital solutions.

aboutPage.historyIntro: Since 2018, we've been transforming ideas into innovative digital solutions that drive our clients' success.

mvv.title: Mission, Vision and Values
mvv.missionText: To transform ideas into innovative digital solutions that drive our clients' growth, adding real value to their businesses through technology and creativity.
mvv.visionText: To be recognized as a reference in integrated digital solutions, expanding our national presence and standing out for excellence, innovation and results delivered to our clients.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet the talented professionals who are part of our team and work daily to deliver the best digital solutions.

differentials.title: Our Differentials
differentials.subtitle: What makes us unique in the market and why our clients trust our services.

agility.title: Agility
agility.description: We deliver projects quickly without compromising quality, using agile methodologies to ensure efficiency and results.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We are always ahead of technological trends, integrating the latest innovations into our projects.

team.title: Multidisciplinary Team
team.description: We have professionals specialized in various areas, ensuring a comprehensive approach for each project.

security.title: Security
security.description: We prioritize data protection and the security of the systems we develop, following market best practices.

cloud.title: Cloud Solutions
cloud.description: We develop and implement cloud-based solutions, ensuring scalability, availability and cost reduction.

support.title: Continuous Support
support.description: We offer post-delivery technical support and continuous maintenance, ensuring that your solution remains updated and functional.

cta.title: Ready to Turn Your Ideas into Reality?
cta.subtitle: Contact us or schedule a personalized consultation to discuss your project.

location.title: Where We Are
location.description: We are located in João Pessoa, but we serve clients from all over Brazil through our integrated digital solutions.

ecommerce.title: Fashion E-commerce
ecommerce.description: Complete online store with payment integration and inventory management.

delivery.title: Delivery App
delivery.description: Mobile application for orders and deliveries with real-time tracking.

institutional.title: Corporate Website
institutional.description: Responsive website with SEO optimization and CRM integration.

dashboard.title: Analytics Dashboard
dashboard.description: Control panel with business metrics and custom reports.

social.title: Corporate Social Network
social.description: Private platform for communication and collaboration between employees.

marketplace.title: B2B Marketplace
marketplace.description: Portal to connect suppliers and buyers in the industrial sector.

finance.title: Financial Management App
finance.description: Application for personal finance control with expense analysis.

education.title: Educational Portal
education.description: Online course platform with student area and digital certification.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer complete digital solutions to transform your online presence and drive your business growth.

websites.title: Website Creation
websites.description: Responsive websites, optimized for SEO and with modern design for your brand to stand out online.

ecommerce.title: Online Stores
ecommerce.description: Complete e-commerce platforms with product management, payments and integrated logistics.

apps.title: Mobile Apps
apps.description: Native or hybrid applications for Android and iOS focusing on usability and performance.

lms.title: Virtual Environments
lms.description: Customized educational platforms (LMS) for online courses and corporate training.

marketing.title: Digital Marketing
marketing.description: Complete digital marketing strategies for positioning and growth of your brand.

social.title: Media Management
social.description: Professional management of social networks to amplify your digital presence.

design.title: Graphic Design
design.description: Visual identity, graphic materials and visual elements to strengthen your brand.

political.title: Political Marketing
political.description: Digital strategies for election campaigns and political presence for the 2026 elections.

testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.subtitle: Our clients' satisfaction is our greatest success indicator. See what they have to say about our solutions.
